author: Troy Fillerup
comment: Seems to work pretty well.  The only problem is that it is a pain to lock and unlock it.  You can do it with your phone, which sucks, or you can turn it upside down which doesn't work all the time.  It would be nice if there was a swipe pattern to unlock it or something that worked a bit better.  Other than that, it does exactly what it says and keeps me from accidentally changing the watch face all the time.

author: Flavius Teodor
comment: I can't lock or unlock my watch by turning it upside down. Only by phone. Any updates to fix this? (maybe a combination, like pressing side button 5 times, or holding it 3 seconds, etc.) I own a Moto 360.
title: Upside down doesn't work.

author: Mark Ellis
comment: Good when it works for about 10 mins, then turns itself off without warning, and turning watch upside down is very unpredictable, and annoying. It also caused my watch to become unresponsive, as per error message. S5 with lollipop and gear live.

reply.author: SoftXperience
reply.content: Please contact me at support@softxperience.com, maybe I can fix this problems. Works great on my LG G Watch R.

title: Not reliable

author: Daniel Porto
comment: Touch screen is not blocked. App should also present an option to disable "wake on tilt". also, would be great if to enable we could use the button on the watch side instead of facing it down.

author: Matthew Nester
comment: Great app, works like it says.
